label: Ghosts and Spirits
description: The spirit realm is a lot closer than you think! Check out these Sci-Fi and Fantasy books that feature ghosts and spirits!

Anna Dressed in Blood, by Kendare Blake
The Regrets: A Novel, by Amy Bonnaffons
Girl With Ghost Eyes, by M. H. Boroson
Changes, by Jim Butcher

Welcome to Night Vale: A Novel, by Joseph Fink

The Graveyard Book, by Neil Gaiman
Our Lady of Mysterious Ailments, by T. L. Huchu

Unholy Ghosts, by Stacia Kane
Sacrificial Magic, by Stacia Kane
